title: [转账晒尸]原版经验变量
author: zmzml
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-6-29 09:25 编辑 

原版经验变量是什么,求.服务器用的bc-level,有人说要用原版经验变量显示当前经验

replies.author: 萌萌哒鱼儿
replies.txt_content:
当前经验:%player_exp%
总经验:%player_total_exp
当前等级%player_exp_to_level% 
更多原版变量请在https://github.com/PlaceholderAP ... Placeholders#player
查找

replies.author: 克哈之子
replies.txt_content: 想要显示经验，随便一个计分板都行吧？

replies.author: redfish
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/PlaceholderAP ... Placeholders#player
这里有你要的

replies.author: zmzml
replies.txt_content:
903527424 发表于 2020-6-29 02:13
当前经验:%player_exp%
总经验:%player_total_exp
当前等级%player_exp_to_level% 
谢谢,懂了
